00374     class Ctx {
00375     public:
00376         Ctx();
00377         ~Ctx();
00379         I32 arg_len() {
00380             return (I32)(PL_stack_sp - mark);
00381         }
00383         Scalar* arg(int n) {
00384             Scalar*s = new Scalar(fetch_stack(n));
00385             this->register_allocated(s);
00386             return s;
00387         }
00389         void ret(Scalar s) {
00390             this->ret(0, &s);
00391         }
00392         void ret(Scalar* s) {
00393             this->ret(0, s);
00394         }
00395         void ret(int n, Scalar* s) {
00396             this->ret(n, s ? s->serialize() : &PL_sv_undef);
00397         }
00399         bool wantarray() {
00400             return GIMME_V & G_ARRAY ? true : false;
00401         }
00403         void ret(Array* ary) {
00404             unsigned int size = ary->size();
00405             if (size != 0) {
00406                 SV** sp = PL_stack_sp;
00407                 if ((unsigned int)(PL_stack_max - sp) < size) {
00408                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, size);
00409                 }
00410 
00411                 for (unsigned int i=0; i < size; ++i) {
00412                     Scalar * s = ary->fetch(i);
00413                     PL_stack_base[ax++] = s->val;
00414                 }
00415                 ax--;
00416             } else {
00417                 this->return_undef();
00418             }
00419         }
00421         void return_true() {
00422             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_yes);
00423         }
00425         void return_undef() {
00426             this->ret(0, &PL_sv_undef);
00427         }
00433         void register_allocated(Value* v) {
00434             allocated.push_back(v);
00435         }
00436     protected:
00441         SV* fetch_stack(int n) {
00442             return PL_stack_base[this->ax + n];
00443         }
00444         void ret(int n, SV* s) {
00445             PL_stack_base[ax + n] = s;
00446         }
00447         I32 ax;
00448         SV ** mark;
00449         std::vector<Value*> allocated;
00450     };
00451     std::vector<Ctx*> ctxstack;
00452     Ctx::Ctx() {
00453         // same as dAXMARK
00454         this->ax = *PL_markstack_ptr + 1;
00455         --PL_markstack_ptr;
00456         this->mark = PL_stack_base + ax - 1;
00457 
00458         ctxstack.push_back(this);
00459     }
00460     Ctx::~Ctx() {
00461         std::vector<Value*>::iterator iter;
00462         for (iter = allocated.begin(); iter != allocated.end(); iter++) {
00463             delete *iter;
00464         }
00465 
00466         PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + ax;
00467 
00468         ctxstack.pop_back();
00469     }

00487     Reference * Hash::fetch(const char* key) {
00488         // SV**    hv_fetch(HV* tb, const char* key, I32 klen, I32 lval)
00489         SV ** v = hv_fetch((HV*)this->val, key, strlen(key), 0);
00490         if (v) {
00491             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00492             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00493             return ref;
00494         } else {
00495             return NULL;
00496         }
00497     }
00498     Reference * Array::fetch(I32 key) {
00499         SV ** v = av_fetch((AV*)this->val, key, 0);
00500         if (v) {
00501             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00502             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00503             return ref;
00504         } else {
00505             return NULL;
00506         }
00507     }
00508     Scalar * Array::pop() {
00509         SV* v = av_pop((AV*)this->val);
00510         Scalar *s = new Scalar(v);
00511         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00512         return s;
00513     }
00514     Scalar * Array::shift() {

00517         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00518         return s;
00519     }
00520     Scalar * Array::store(I32 key, Scalar* _v) {
00521         _v->refcnt_inc();
00522         SV** v = av_store((AV*)this->val, key, _v->val);
00523         if (v) {
00524             Reference * ref = new Reference(*v);
00525             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00526             return ref;
00527         } else {
00528             return NULL;
00529         }
00530     }

00570     class BootstrapCtx : public Ctx {
00571     public:
00572         BootstrapCtx() : Ctx() {
00573             xs_version_bootcheck();
00574         }
00575         ~BootstrapCtx() {
00576             PL_stack_base[this->ax] = &PL_sv_yes;
00577             PL_stack_sp = PL_stack_base + this->ax;
00578         }
00579     protected:
00580         // XS_VERSION_BOOTCHECK
00581         void xs_version_bootcheck() {
00582             SV *_sv;
00583             const char *vn = NULL, *module = SvPV_nolen_const(ST(0));
00584             if (this->arg_len() >= 2) {
00585                 /* version supplied as bootstrap arg */
00586                 _sv = PL_stack_base[ax+1];
00587             } else {
00588                 /* XXX GV_ADDWARN */
00589                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00590                         vn = "XS_VERSION"), FALSE);
00591                 if (!_sv || !SvOK(_sv))
00592                 _sv = get_sv(Perl_form(aTHX_ "%s::%s", module,
00593                             vn = "VERSION"), FALSE);
00594             }
00595             if (_sv) {
00596                 SV *xssv = Perl_newSVpv(aTHX_ XS_VERSION, 0);
00597                 xssv = new_version(xssv);
00598                 if ( !sv_derived_from(_sv, "version") ) {
00599                     _sv = new_version(_sv);
00600                 }
00601                 if ( vcmp(_sv,xssv) ) {
00602                     Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s object version %"SVf" does not match %s%s%s%s %"SVf,
00603                         module, SVfARG(vstringify(xssv)),
00604                         vn ? "$" : "", vn ? module : "", vn ? "::" : "",
00605                         vn ? vn : "bootstrap parameter", SVfARG(vstringify(_sv)));
00606                 }
00607             }
00608         }
00609     };
00610 
00614     class Code : public Scalar {
00615     public:
00616         Code(SV * _s) : Scalar(_s) { }
00618         void call(Array * args, Array* retval) {
00619             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00620 
00621             push_scope(); // ENTER
00622             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00623             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00624 
00625             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00626                 markstack_grow();
00627             }
00628             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00629 
00630             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00631                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00632                     // optimize?
00633                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00634                 }
00635                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00636             }
00637             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00638 
00639             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_ARRAY);
00640 
00641             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00642 
00643             for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00644                 Scalar * s = new Scalar(newSVsv(*sp--));
00645                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00646                 retval->store(i, s);
00647             }
00648 
00649             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00650             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00651                 free_tmps();
00652             }
00653             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00654         }
00656         void call(Array * args, Scalar** retval) {
00657             SV **sp = PL_stack_sp;
00658 
00659             push_scope(); // ENTER
00660             save_int((int*)&PL_tmps_floor); // SAVETMPS
00661             PL_tmps_floor = PL_tmps_ix;
00662 
00663             if (++PL_markstack_ptr == PL_markstack_max) { // PUSHMARK(SP);
00664                 markstack_grow();
00665             }
00666             *PL_markstack_ptr = (I32)((sp) - PL_stack_base);
00667 
00668             for (int i =0; i < args->len()+1; i++) {
00669                 if (PL_stack_max - sp < 1) { // EXTEND()
00670                     // optimize?
00671                     sp = stack_grow(sp, sp, 1);
00672                 }
00673                 *++sp = args->pop()->val; // XPUSHs
00674             }
00675             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00676 
00677             int count = call_sv(this->val, G_SCALAR);
00678 
00679             sp = PL_stack_sp; // SPAGAIN
00680 
00681             if (count != 0) {
00682                 *retval = new Scalar(newSVsv(*sp--));
00683                 CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(*retval);
00684             }
00685 
00686             PL_stack_sp = sp; // PUTBACK
00687             if (PL_tmps_ix > PL_tmps_floor) { // FREETMPS
00688                 free_tmps();
00689             }
00690             pop_scope(); // LEAVE
00691         }
00692     };

00697     class Pointer : public Scalar {
00698     public:
00699         Pointer(SV* s) : Scalar(s) { }
00701         Pointer(void* _ptr, const char* klass) : Scalar(sv_newmortal()) {
00702             if (_ptr == NULL) {
00703                 sv_setsv(this->val, &PL_sv_undef);
00704             } else {
00705                 sv_setref_pv(this->val, klass, _ptr);
00706             }
00707         }
00708 
00712         template <class T>
00713         T extract() {
00714             return INT2PTR(T, SvROK(this->val) ? SvIV(SvRV(this->val)) : SvIV(this->val));
00715         }
00716     };

00721     class Carp {
00722     public:
00723         static void croak(const char * format, ...) {
00724             va_list args;
00725             va_start(args, format);
00726             Perl_vcroak(aTHX_ format, &args);
00727             va_end(args);
00728         }
00729         static void warn(const char * format, ...) {
00730             va_list args;
00731             va_start(args, format);
00732             Perl_vwarn(aTHX_ format, &args);
00733             va_end(args);
00734         }
00735     };

00741     class FileTest {
00742     public:
00747         static bool is_regular_file(const char * fname) {
00748             Stat_t buf;
00749             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00750             if (ret == 0 && S_ISREG(buf.st_mode)) {
00751                 return true;
00752             } else {
00753                 return false;
00754             }
00755         }
00760         static bool is_dir(const char * fname) {
00761             Stat_t buf;
00762             int ret = PerlLIO_stat(fname, &buf);
00763             if (ret == 0 && S_ISDIR(buf.st_mode)) {
00764                 return true;
00765             } else {
00766                 return false;
00767             }
00768         }
00769     };

00775     Str* Scalar::as_str() {
00776         if (SvPOK(this->val)) {
00777             Str * s = new Str(this->val);
00778             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00779             return s;
00780         } else {
00781             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a string",
00782                 "Devel::BindPP",
00783                 "sv");
00784         }
00785     }

00850     Hash * Reference::as_hash() {
00851         if (SvROK(this->val) && SvTYPE(SvRV(this->val))==SVt_PVHV) {
00852             HV* h = (HV*)SvRV(this->val);
00853             Hash * hobj = new Hash(h);
00854             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(hobj);
00855             return hobj;
00856         } else {
00857             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a hash reference",
00858                 "Devel::BindPP",
00859                 "hv");
00860         }
00861     }
00862     Array * Reference::as_array() {
00863         SV* v = this->val;
00864         if (SvROK(v) && SvTYPE(SvRV(v))==SVt_PVAV) {
00865             AV* a = (AV*)SvRV(v);
00866             Array * obj = new Array(a);
00867             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00868             return obj;
00869         } else {
00870             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00871                 "Devel::BindPP",
00872                 "av");
00873         }
00874     }
00875     Scalar * Reference::as_scalar() {
00876         SV* v = this->val;
00877         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00878             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00879             Scalar * obj = new Scalar(a);
00880             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00881             return obj;
00882         } else {
00883             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00884                 "Devel::BindPP",
00885                 "sv");
00886         }
00887     }
00888     Code * Reference::as_code() {
00889         SV* v = this->val;
00890         if (v && SvROK(v)) {
00891             SV* a = (SV*)SvRV(v);
00892             Code * obj = new Code(a);
00893             CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(obj);
00894             return obj;
00895         } else {
00896             Perl_croak(aTHX_ "%s: %s is not a array reference",
00897                 "Devel::BindPP",
00898                 "sv");
00899         }
00900     }
00901 
00902     Reference* Hash::del(const char*key, I32 klen) {
00903         Reference * ref = new Reference(hv_delete((HV*)this->val, key, klen, 0));
00904         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00905         return ref;
00906     }
00907     Reference* Hash::store(const char*key, I32 klen, Scalar*value) {
00908         value->refcnt_inc();
00909         SV ** s = hv_store((HV*)this->val, key, klen, value->val, 0);
00910         assert(s && SvROK(*s));
00911         Reference * ref = new Reference(*s);
00912         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(ref);
00913         return ref;
00914     }
00915     Scalar* Hash::scalar() {
00916         Scalar*s = new Scalar(hv_scalar((HV*)this->val));
00917         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00918         return s;
00919     }
00920     void Hash::undef() {
00921         hv_undef((HV*)this->val);
00922     }
00923     void Hash::clear() {
00924         hv_clear((HV*)this->val);
00925     }
00926     Boolean* Boolean::yes() {
00927         Boolean* s = new Boolean(true);
00928         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00929         return s;
00930     }
00931     Boolean* Boolean::no() {
00932         Boolean* s = new Boolean(false);
00933         CurCtx::get()->register_allocated(s);
00934         return s;
00935     }
